cot:
The testimony from Oldbag claims that the only person she saw go to the studio before the time of death was Will Powers and that no one else went there, implying exclusivity. However, the "Steel Samurai Card" (Evidence 12) suggests that someone else, likely a fan or another actor associated with the Steel Samurai, could have been present, contradicting Oldbag's claim that no one else went to the studio.
